I For analysis, nee page 4.$ To ascertain the number of vessels actually in the service of the Allies on the date of this return the number given under I. and IV. on page 2 must be included. In. addition, a number of vessels shown under ore, phosphates, lead, &c, under (3) on page 4 load outward for an Allied Government. A comparison of the numbers shown under I. and IV. for the 8 months does not therefore give an accurate criterion of the vessels in Allied service at the different periods.*f " Requisition " is here used to mean " requisition for full Government service."cfc In " ^Requisitioned vessels" and " Vessels repairing (from Services in I.)
